actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: To restrict United States assistance of any kind to Turkey until Turkey uses its influence with the Turkish Cypriot leadership to achieve a settlement on Cyprus based on United Nations Security Council resolutions.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits U.S. assistance to Turkey until it uses its influence with the Turkish Cypriot leadership to achieve a settlement on Cyprus that calls for certain goals to be met.

titles.title: To restrict United States assistance of any kind to Turkey until Turkey uses its influence with the Turkish Cypriot leadership to achieve a settlement on Cyprus based on United Nations Security Council resolutions.
